description: This course is designed to expand on the skills learned in the Introduction to Excel 2007 training. Specifically this class will focus on using multiple sheets in a workbook, the advantages of working with range names, creating and applying spreadsheet templates, using the outline features and creating subtotals, and understanding all the options found in Paste Special. A significant amount of the course will be spent covering creating and manipulating charts and using drawing tools to annotate charts and spreadsheets.
title: Excel 2007 Intermediate
